Name: ethanol production from potatoes | Distiller's Dried Grains with Solubles | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: The process is similar to that of wheat-to-ethanol or yet dry-milling corn-to-ethanol. The production of DDGS from stillage includes separation of draff, concentration, drying and granulation. DDGS are used as animal feed.
